name: Unstable Gun Meets Zombies!
description:
Unstable Gun Meets Zombies!
IS about a patriot that has had enough and is doing army job, takes the city and disables the almost exploding reactor!

But his gun is unstable you switch from healing enemies to dealing damage, Good luck and have fun!

Ps:Made in 72H for Ludun Dare Game Jam!

And recommend playing full screen!

Controls:

WASD - MOVE

Mouse - Shoot and pass cutscenes!
